newsitem.title: LATVIA: BUDGET SURPLUS 21.55 MLN LATS BY MAY 22.
newsitem.headline: BUDGET SURPLUS 21.55 MLN LATS BY MAY 22.

text.p: Latvia's state budget surplus this year amounted to 21.55 million lats by May 22, the finance ministry said on Friday.
Revenues so far amounted to 221.44 million lats and expenditure reached 199.88 million lats, the ministry said in a statement.
It also said that the internal state debt came to 408.53 million lats.
This was financed by the state Treasury bills worth 137.25 million lats as well as 64.78 million of IMF credits.
